title: How a plant based athlete eats with John Rush
description:
In Episode #157 I sit down with professional Canadian Footballer John Rush to chat about his career, diet and plenty more.

Specifically we cover:


John's path to becoming a professional footballer

When and why he decided to change his approach to nutrition

How his dietary changes affected his performance

How his dietary changes were received by his coach, teammates and family members

The typical foods he eats in a day

Supplements

and much more


I hope you enjoy it.

Resources:
